about_the_game:
Boyfriend for Hire is captivating visual novel where you can immerse yourself in the drama-filled world of high school where the main character faces a whirlwind of manipulation and betrayal. When a toxic, gaslighting friend makes life unbearable, she takes a drastic step by hiring a fake lover to counteract the deceit and reclaim her reputation. Navigate through emotional twists and turns as you make pivotal choices and uncover the intricate drama of high school.

Game Story: A captivating high school romance that delves into the complexities of love and friendship. When the main character hires someone to be her fake lover to avoid peer pressure, she never expects her heart to get involved. As their pretend relationship blossoms, a classmate, who secretly likes her, watches from the sidelines, struggling with his unspoken feelings. Tensions rise as the main character finds herself torn between the charming hired lover and the loyal friend who’s always been there. Full of heart-fluttering moments, this love triangle will keep you hooked until the very end.

Game Features:

Choose Your Love Interest: Tailor romantic storylines by selecting the gender of your love interest. Our game will automatically present the correct character in the storyline to captivate your attention.


Customizable Outfits: Dress up your character for special occasions. Fancy an evening dress for that special occasion? Or would you rather have that more demure look to downplay your intentions? We got it covered. Simply click to change outfits and look fab.


Impactful Decisions: Make impactful choices that drive the narrative based on your actions and decisions. Ever felt like you needed to tell off that annoying character in-game? Or, what happens if you decide to fall for one of Javier’s charms despite knowing he’s up to no good? Choose your own adventure.
